issue.title: [R] Detect compression by magic number where possible
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16622](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16622). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
readr does this like so:
<https://github.com/tidyverse/readr/commit/3e1195762a204fd053ba0d7d88ed3e80a1810510>

I think we could largely take that same approach at least as a first pass at detection perhaps falling back on file extensions. This would be a little safer. 

This would apply to read functions though maybe if not too expensive we could check outputs for a successful write.
